response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by both myself and you, ensuring mutual satisfaction. Considering its high quality and unique features, I kindly propose an offer of $14,000 for it. I am confident this price reflects its true value while providing you with a competitive advantage. Please let me know if this offer meets your considerations, and we can proceed with the transaction. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
